lyrics.lyric: Abyss
I've seen Hell rise
Out of your eyes
Creep up at night to your demise
lyrics.tlyric: 在夜里蔓延，把你引向消亡

lyrics.lyric: You've gotta fight
I've gotta fight, been thinkin' that I need isolation
lyrics.tlyric: 我也必须战斗，思绪翻涌，我多想远离喧嚣

lyrics.lyric: All this devastation
Head needs renovation, alright
lyrics.tlyric: 头部需要革命，明白了吗

lyrics.lyric: If you had to choose, would you ever let me go?
lyrics.tlyric: 若是必须让你抉择，你是否会放我离开？

lyrics.lyric: Oh, I can't stop the monster
I'm losing my control
Could someone please save my life?
Could someone please save my life?
Could someone please save my life?
'Cause I've gone cold
Save my life
Could someone please save my life?
Could someone please save my life?
'Cause I've gone cold
And I'm stuck in the abyss all on my own
lyrics.tlyric: 孤身一人 困陷在无边的深渊

lyrics.lyric: Save my life
Could someone please save my life?
Could someone please save my life?
'Cause I've gone cold
And I'm stuck in the abyss all on my own
lyrics.tlyric: 孤身一人 困陷在无边的深渊

tlyric.lyric:
[by:人类迷惑行为__]
[00:15.042]凝视你的双眸 
[00:17.461]瞥见那地狱业火升腾
[00:18.898]夜里悄然蔓延 结局引向你的消亡
[00:21.465]你必须奋起抗争
[00:22.988]我也不能坐以待毙 思绪翻涌 我多么需要与世隔绝 远离喧嚣
[00:26.861]满目疮痍 亟待修葺
[00:28.818]心灵也需要修整翻新
[00:31.261]
[00:33.495]若是命运让你抉择 你会放我离开吗？
[00:39.807]噢 心中的恶魔在肆虐 我就要全然失控
[00:47.472]Oh, oh
[00:48.240]
[00:48.937]谁能拯救我脱离苦海？
[00:52.996]谁能拯救我脱离苦海？
[00:56.919]谁能拯救我脱离苦海？
